extends TaskSubject
implements Observer

    int requiredAmountOfDevelopers)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The creator of task
        Parameters:
        clock - The clock to be used for this task
        description - The description for the task
        estimatedDuration - The estimated duration for the task
        acceptableDeviation - The acceptable deviation for the task
        resourceTypes - The resource types for the task
        requiredAmountOfDevelopers - The required amount of developers for the task
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] Will throw an exception if one of the parameters is illegal
